Week 6 - More with dashboards & Map Viz

We will start thinking about maps & map projection, both in bqplot and matplotlib. Weâ€™ll start this week with building dashboards of mappable data.

Downloads

Data:

  • The UFO Sitings Dataset (13Mb) - ufo-scrubbed-geocoded-time-standardized-00.csv
  • State export data (8Kb) - total_export.csv
  • Backup: Surgery Charges Dataset (37Mb) - market_map_data.csv

This might not be used until next week:

  • Earthquake sensor data (59Mb) - data_tohoku_norm_transpose.csv
  • Earthquake locations data (12Kb) - location.txt

Resources:

  • State export utilities (Python library) - states_utils.py
  • US State abbreviations (Python library) - us_state_abbrev.py

Optional reading list

  1. VAD Ch. 8: Arrange Spatial Data
  2. VAD Ch. 11: Manipulate View
  3. FDA, Ch. 15: Visualizing geospatial data
